snoopy.blindnote: Three close paralogs (and a degenerated copy) reside in the RPL17 gene. Due to the lack of a consensus D'box, Yang et al. (2006) predicted that U58C (SNORD58C) guides the methylation of 28S rRNA U4197, whereas Kiss-Laszlo et al. (1996) predicted that U58A guides the methylation of 28S rRNA G4198. U58ABC might guide the methylation of both bases by a sliding mechanism.(comment from snoRNABase) sno/scaRNAs with same target 28S rRNA G4198, U4197 : SNORD58A SNORD58A SNORD58C (20100707末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss-Laszlo, Z., Henry, Y., Bachellerie, J. P., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., and Kiss, T. (1996). Site-specific ribose methylation of preribosomal RNA: a novel function for small nucleolar RNAs. Cell, 85, 1077-1088.
